description.p: When you choose this patron at 3rd level, you gain the following features.
The magic of your patron ensures you always have certain spells prepared. When you reach a Warlock level specified in the Archfey Spells table, you thereafter always have the listed spells prepared.

tr.td: Calm Emotions, Faerie Fire, Misty Step, Phantasmal Force, Sleep

description.p: These spells don't count against the number of spells you can prepare.

Your patron grants you the ability to move between the boundaries of the planes. You can cast Misty Step without expending a spell slot a number of times equal to your Charisma modifier (minimum of once), and you regain all expended uses when you finish a Long Rest.
In addition, whenever you cast that spell, you can choose one of the following additional effects:

ul.li: Refreshing Step. Immediately after you teleport, you or one creature you can see within 10 feet of yourself gains 1d10 Temporary Hit Points.

Taunting Step. Creatures within 5 feet of the space you left must succeed on a Wisdom saving throw against your spell save DC or have Disadvantage on attack rolls against creatures other than you until the start of your next turn.

sheet.description: Cast Misty Step without a spell slot. On cast, choose one of the following additinal benefits: â€¢ you or a creature within 10 ft gains 1d10 Temporary HP; â€¢ creatures within 5 ft of the space you left make WIS save vs DC {{warlock:spellcasting:dc}} or have Disadvantage on attacks vs others until your next turn.

description.p: You can cast Misty Step as a Reaction in response to taking damage.
In addition, the following effects are now among your Steps of the Fey options:

ul.li: Disappearing Step. You have the Invisible condition until the start of your next turn or until you make an attack roll, deal damage, or cast a spell.
Dreadful Step. Creatures within 5 feet of the space you left or the space you appear in (your choice) must succeed on a WIS Saving Throw against your Spellcasting DC or take 2d10 Psychic damage

sheet.description: When you take damage, cast Misty Step. Choose one of the following effects: â€¢ You became Invisible until start of your next turn or until you attack/deal damage/cast a spell; â€¢ creatures within 5 ft of the space you left or arrive in (chose one): WIS save vs DC {{warlock:spellcasting:dc}} or take 2d10 Psychic.

description.p: Your patron teaches you how to guard your mind and body. You are immune to the Charmed condition.

In addition, immediately after a creature you can see hits you with an attack roll, you can take a Reaction to reduce the damage you take by half (round down), and you can force the attacker to make a Wisdom saving throw against your spell save DC. On a failed save, the attacker takes Psychic damage equal to the damage you take. Once you use this Reaction, you can't use it again until you finish a Long Rest unless you expend a Pact Magic spell slot (no action required) to restore your use of it.

sheet.description: You are immune to the Charmed condition. When a creature hits you with an attack roll, you can halve the damage (rounded down). The creature makes a WIS Saving Throw DC {{warlock:spellcasting:dc}} or take the same amount of Psychic damages. You can restore a use expending a spell slot.

description.p: Your patron grants you the ability to weave your magic with teleportation. Immediately after you cast an Enchantment or Illusion spell using an action and a spell slot, you can cast Misty Step as part of the same action and without expending a spell slot.

sheet.description: When you cast an Enchantment or Illusion spell using an Action and a spell slot, you can cast Misty Step as part of the same action without expending a spell slot.
